Uses of Class
net.jodah.failsafe.PolicyExecutor

  • Packages that use PolicyExecutor 
    Package Description
    net.jodah.failsafe
    Core Failsafe APIs for performing failsafe executions.

    • Uses of PolicyExecutor in net.jodah.failsafe

      Methods in net.jodah.failsafe that return PolicyExecutor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyExecutor<Policy<R>> Policy.toExecutor(AbstractExecution execution)
      Returns an PolicyExecutor capable of performing an execution in the context of a Policy and handling results according to the Policy.

      PolicyExecutor Timeout.toExecutor(AbstractExecution execution) 
      PolicyExecutor RetryPolicy.toExecutor(AbstractExecution execution)
